SELECT db.NODE_NAME as "majorName",count(b.MAJOR_CODE) as cnt from WBPLAT.TDMBM01 db left join (select d.MAJOR_CODE from WBPLAT.TDMFM01 d,WBPLAT.TDMFM02 d2 where d.FAULT_NO=d2.FAULT_NO and to_date(d.FILLIN_TIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') >= add_months(SYSDATE, -3) and d.FAULT_FLAG <> '2'
and d2.ORDER_STATUS <> '99' ) b on db.NODE_CODE = b.MAJOR_CODE where db.PARENT_NODE_REC_ID = '0' group by db.NODE_NAME,db.NODE_CODE order by cnt desc,db.NODE_CODE

SELECT db.NODE_NAME as "majorName",count(b.MAJOR_CODE) as cnt from WBPLAT.TDMBM01 db left join (select d.MAJOR_CODE from WBPLAT.TDMFM01 d,WBPLAT.TDMFM02 d2 where d.FAULT_NO=d2.FAULT_NO and to_date(d.FILLIN_TIME, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') -trunc(sysdate) between -7 and 7 and d.FAULT_FLAG <> '2'
and d2.ORDER_STATUS <> '99' ) b on db.NODE_CODE = b.MAJOR_CODE where db.PARENT_NODE_REC_ID = '0' group by db.NODE_NAME,db.NODE_CODE order by cnt desc,db.NODE_CODE

SELECT t.ORDER_STATUS AS status, iplat60.QUERYCODECNAME('dm.faultStatus',t.ORDER_STATUS,'1') AS cname,count(1) as cnt FROM WBPLAT.TDMFM02 t, WBPLAT.TDMFM01 d WHERE 1 = 1 AND d.FAULT_NO = t.FAULT_NO and d.FAULT_FLAG <> '2'
and to_date(d.FILLIN_TIME,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') >= add_months(SYSDATE, -3) GROUP BY t.ORDER_STATUS ORDER BY cnt DESC
